entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CI Failure: No templates or subcommands found matching: 'wasmbrowser' #76269
  • [API Proposal]: Add nullable annotation to INumberBase<>.TryParse #76260
    7.0.0
  • signal SIGFPE during garbage collecting #76257
  • Runtime fails to build with latest compiler: CS0208 #76255
    Future
  • System.Net.Mail.SmtpClient does not support OAUTH2 while Office 365 is moving to require OAUTH2 for Exchange online #76253
    Future
  • How to tell how much memory a .NET 6 application is really using? #76249
  • ILCompiler no longer works with paths containing spaces #76248
  • [mono][runtime-extra-platform] Ran out of trampolines of type 1 #76245
  • Explore adding an `IVector<TSelf, T>` interface implemented by `Vector128<T>`/`Vector256<T>` #76244
    8.0.0
  • Option to Disable JIT Optimizations for specific .NET Core Assembly #76240
    8.0.0
  • [.NET 7.0.0-rc.1]System.Drawing WebP support does not work #76237
  • [Perf] Regressions in Dictionary and Hashset on 9/24/2022 1:05:07 PM #76256
  • VerifyHeap fails on frozen heap #76232
    8.0.0
  • [API Proposal]: Disposable pattern in synchronization primitives #76230
  • Occasional crash in IIS after compile #76228
  • TimeSpan has all of the semantics of numbers, but none of the new interfaces #76225

Closed

  • UseWindowsService should support some method to invoke ServiceBase.RequestAdditionalTime #75276
    Future
  • Undocumented 7.0 APIs in System.Numerics #72410
    7.0.0
  • LdapConnection.SendRequest cause a segfault on linux #66652
    Future
  • LdapConnection - app crash on .net 6 linux #70648
    Future
  • Permissions in ZipArchive Missing on Linux - Regression in .Net 7 RC1? #76006
  • CLR: static const inline std::map causing System.AccessViolationException in xtree on application exit #76210
  • mono AOT compiler cannot resolve and inline static virtual calls in gshared methods #75801
    8.0.0
  • Suspicious values in GenerationInfo SizeBeforeBytes / SizeAfterBytes #76188
    8.0.0
  • Proxy doesn't authenticate on .NET 6 #75745
  • Incorrect string length calculation in LdapPal.Linux #76125
  • [API Proposal]: Support Operator Generic Type Constraints #76226
  • X509Certificate2.CreateFromPemFile throws error when reading AWS pem file #76242
  • Possible bug for `LoggerMessageAttribute` generator when having an `ExpressionBody` #66080
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: System.Text.Json deserialize escaped Json string (from Python server) with properties of type ObservableCollection<CustomClass> #76229
  • Ensure shared framework consumes source-built RID graph #53550
    7.0.0
  • [Group 5] Enable nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67197
    8.0.0
  • 为何开源基金会要参与政治？？为何不曾支持伊拉克 利比亚 叙利亚？？ #76231
  • IsolatedStorageFile.GetUserStoreForApplication path changes between Xamarin.iOS and .NET 6 builds on iOS #74642
    8.0.0
  • Spilling does not work for some multi-reg nodes #73070
    8.0.0

PullRequests

Created

  • Simplify type info resolver assignment #76275
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • Add List<T> AddRange, InsertRange, and CopyTo extensions for spans #76274
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Remove GT_ADDEX and replace with more generalized containment handling #76273
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix #76260 Add nullable annotation to INumberBase<>.TryParse #76272
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, 7.0.0
  • Add custom ResponseFile handler #76271
    community-contribution, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0][workloads] Bump the runtime net6 versions for GA #76270
    area-Infrastructure, 7.0.0
  • update arm32 test queues for msquic #76267
    arch-arm32, area-Infrastructure-libraries, os-linux, test-enhancement
  • Only bundle OpenSSL Android on actual Bionic builds #76266
  • Testing a compiler change #76265
    area-System.Reflection
  • Enable multi-reg `LONG` nodes on 32 bit #76263
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Fix value type with static method fails to load #76262
    area-TypeSystem-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • [release/7.0] 74642 change isostorage path #76254
    Servicing-consider, area-System.IO, os-ios, os-tvos, os-maccatalyst
  • GC: Fix CheckPromoted for frozen objects #76251
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Make "Personal" on Android also point to a Documents folder #76250
    area-System.Runtime, os-android, community-contribution
  • Increase number of Apple trampolines to 40000 #76246
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Dot intrinsics for Amd64 #76239
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • SPMI: Improve speed significantly for large diffs #76238
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] WasmAppHost: Fix crash when starting wasmbrowser project #76236
    arch-wasm, area-VM-meta-mono
  • Remove IlcTrimMetadata=false from a couple tests #76234
    area-System.Collections
  • Align repro project settings with SDK defaults #76233
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • Fix diagnostic for properties on instantiated types #76227
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Updating Vector256 to have its software fallback be 2x Vector128<T> ops #76221
    area-System.Numerics
  • global.json: Bump sdk to 7.0.100-rtm.22476.1 to pick up a msbuild fix #76220

Merged

  • [wasm] Keep all icall wrappers in profile only mode, the generated co… #75918
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Change COMPlus to DOTNET when referring to prefixes of env vars #76264
    area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Temporarily patch out native sourcelink file check in source-build. #76252
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Support containing HWIntrinsics that can operate like a store #76212
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support a few "shifted register" operations on Arm64 #75823
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76034
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 7.0.0
  • Set `AppHostSigningException.ExitCode` #76038
    area-HostModel
  • Fix spilling of `MUL_LONG` on x86 and multi-reg HWIs #73079
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Ensure CreateScalarUnsafe gets constant handling on Arm64 #76204
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix LoggerMessageGenerator parser to check for expression bodied method #75601
    area-Extensions-Logging, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] Fix the assert error for `genSetRegToIcon()` #76164
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Disabling disasm checks under certain testing environments #76202
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Do not run DynamicGenerics on mac (#74618) #76223
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Preserve last error for patchpoint helpers #76200
    Servicing-approved, area-CodeGen-coreclr, 7.0.0
  • Improve vectorization of Enumerable.Min/Max #76144
    area-System.Linq, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • 74642 change isostorage path #75541
    area-System.IO
  • [mono][aot] Prefer specific instances instead of gshared for methods … #76033
    area-Codegen-AOT-mono
  • Fix incorrect string length calculation #76127
    area-System.DirectoryServices, community-contribution
  • Improve IPAddress to/from bytes perf #75872
    area-System.Net
  • JIT: refactor and enhance the redundant branch optimizer #76207
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Extend RuntimeHelpers.IsBitwiseEquatable to more types #75640
    area-VM-coreclr, 8.0.0
  • Nullable annotations for System.Security.Cryptography.Xml #67198
    area-System.Security, community-contribution
  • Revert "Allocate RuntimeType objects on Frozen Object Heap #76235
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use generated runtime.json when building shared framework packages. #76068
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, community-contribution
  • [mono] Add Vector128 AndNot intrinsic for amd64 #74586
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • Fix bugs found from static analyzer #76160
    area-Meta, community-contribution

Updated

  • More disasm check CI fixes #76276
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • Adding EVEX encoding support for emitOutputRRR(). #75934
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-avx512
  • [release/7.0] [wasm][debugger] Support create, debugging and running wasmbrowser template from VS #76113
    Servicing-approved, 7.0.0
  • ActivatorUtilities not depending on ctor order for creating instances #75846
    area-Extensions-DependencyInjection
  • Make sure we at least sweep the loh even when we wanted to compact it #74626
    NO-MERGE, area-GC-coreclr
  • Decommit free regions when close to OutOfMemory #76216
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Try moving mobile tests into their own pipelines. #75213
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Discount committed when checking for sufficient space #76217
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Ensure end_gen0_region_space is always computed #76214
    area-GC-coreclr
  • Fix DiagnosticSource to work with NativeAOT #76109
    area-System.Diagnostics.Tracing
  • Resolve tvOS/iOS FileSystem test failures #74927
    area-System.IO
  • WIP: [mono] Include inspection of CustomConstantAttribute when resolving default values for parameters via reflection #75612
    area-System.Reflection-mono
  • add 0x63 status code #74780
    blocked, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, community-contribution
  • [API Implementation]: Expose general purpose Crc32 APIs #61558
    area-System.Numerics, new-api-needs-documentation, 8.0.0
  • Check if the string is null first before checking if it is a file #76190
    area-System.Configuration, community-contribution
  • Support running Reflection tests within Visual Studio #75915
    area-System.Reflection, test-enhancement, 8.0.0
  • [Mono] Implement eager finalization of WeakReference #76173
    area-VM-meta-mono, community-contribution
  • Cross-compile Wasm cross-compilers for ARM64 machines #74428
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Enable IDE0060 (Remove unused parameter) analyzer #72667
    area-Meta
  • [mono] Add Vector128 Negate and OnesComplement intrinsics for amd64 #74993
    area-Codegen-LLVM-mono
  • [wasm] add missing API xml doc #76196
    arch-wasm, new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Use UTF8 encoding on Tar string fields #75902
    area-System.IO
  • [release/6.0] [wasm][debugger] Fix debugging an app that has another .NET Wasm instance in a service worker #76075
    Servicing-approved, area-Debugger-mono, 6.0.11
  • [Mono][Test] Collapse mono runtime tests into single builds using global-build-job template #62863
    area-Infrastructure-mono
  • [release/6.0] Remove locks from COM events delegate management. #76035
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, 6.0.11
  • Add QuicError.AlpnInUse member #74754
    new-api-needs-documentation, area-System.Net.Quic, 8.0.0
  • docs: add missing document to microsoft.extensions.options #76121
    area-Extensions-Options, community-contribution
  • Pass TargetRid and SourceBuildNonPortable to the native scripts #74504
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Improve HTTP/1 response header parsing #74393
    area-System.Net.Http
  • [NativeAOT] Fix System.Runtime.InteropServices tests #75669
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • [wasm] new unit test for duplicate call to ImportAsync #76179
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, 8.0.0
  • Add Generic Enum.TryFormat() #71590
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • [mono] Fix missing defined and SIMD checks in Sqrt, Floor, Ceiling intrinsics #76177
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • ZipArchive.CreateEntry: include file type in default ExternalAttributes. #76059
    area-System.IO.Compression, community-contribution, 8.0.0
  • Revert "Adapt System.CommandLine (v2) in more places" #76213
    area-crossgen2-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Notify debugger about empty URLs #76187
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono
  • Reduce allocations around empty ReadOnlyCollections #76097
    area-System.Collections
  • [wasm][debugger] Trying to fix firefox flaky tests on CI. #75090
    area-Debugger-mono
  • [wasm] Templates nits #76182
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, 8.0.0
  • [mono][jit] Devirtualize ldarg(s)+callvirt where possible. #75748
    area-Codegen-JIT-mono
  • [wasm] Update templates to work for multiple versions #76124
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Add missing xml documentation #76191
    area-System.Text.Json, 8.0.0
  • [mono][interp] Replace sign extending moves to normal moves #75837
    area-Codegen-Interpreter-mono
  • Cleanup some math helpers in DecimalCalc #76118
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [wasm] CI improvements for triggering jobs #76215
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure
  • [release/7.0] Disable EventSource support in NativeAOT by default #76052
    Servicing-consider, area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • [wasm][debugger] Support indexing by non-numbers #76065
    arch-wasm, area-Debugger-mono, 8.0.0
  • [wasm] [debugger] First version of multithreaded debugging #74820
    area-Debugger-mono
  • JIT: import static readonly fields holding frozen objects as const handles #76112
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix not to create unnecessary `thread_params` #76007
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Memory model document. #75790
    area-Meta, memory model
  • Reduce Enum.GetEnumName overheads #76162
    area-System.Runtime, tenet-performance, 8.0.0
  • [IGNORE] testing workload installs #76218
    NO-MERGE, NO-REVIEW, area-Infrastructure-mono
  • Add new version of the ContentionStart event #72627
    area-Tracing-coreclr, community-contribution, 8.0.0

entry.title: dotnet/runtimelab - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Question: NativeAOT-LLVM: PublishTrimming= true would be advantageous #1998

PullRequests

Created

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: add declares for internal methods that are only used from the clrjit module #1997

Merged

  • NativeAOT-LLVM: consume pointer for NULLCHECK to i8* #1996

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Unable to generate ready to run compilation for managed code that references native assemblies #28223
  • `dotnet workload` fails with KeyNotFoundException after updating SDKs #28217
  • [NetSDKE2E][Regression] With 3.1.424 SDK, building a project with multi referring classlib failed with error MSB1025 on Mac/Linux #28190
  • `dotnet pack` dose not work with the `Version` property offered by targets #28189

PullRequests

Created

  • Increase cache assets file format version to 11 in 7.0.1xx #28222
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Increase version of asset cache file format #28218
    Area-ReadyToRun
  • Revert pr28057 #28212
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2005593 #28210
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0.1xx' => 'main' #28209
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update windows images for release/7.0.1xx #28197
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update windows images for release/6.0.1xx #28194
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Add Dependancy on Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #27555
    Area-CodeFlow
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Provide package description for APICompat packages #28167
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Add warning when targeting 7.0 in 17.3 and remove 7.0 from the list of supported targets #28224
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 2005659 #27667
  • Improve the example with specified language when language option is given with invalid option #28135
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Revert "do not emit diagnostic when attribute argument is internal type" #27774
    Area-ApiCompat
  • Add dependancy on Microsoft.TemplateEngine.Mocks #27556
    Area-CodeFlow

entry.title: dotnet/csharplang - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Suffix to denote byte literals #1058

Updated

  • [Proposal]: Change ref safety errors to warnings in unsafe contexts #6476
    Working Set
  • Champion "permit methods in enum declarations" #297
    Backlog

PullRequests

Merged

  • Grammar improvements #6497

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Intellisense should not suggest such improbable suggestions and should delete suggestion at a single Backspace keypress #64326
    Backlog
  • After upgrading "Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.CSharp" from 4.2.0 to 4.30 generator errors #64323
  • Test CSharpCompletionCommandHandlerTests.TestNonBlockingExpandCompletionViaExpander failed in CI #64321
  • Code Style is not respecting the selection for use of "Prefer framework" for the "Predefined type preferences." #64317
    Backlog
  • Inadequate diagnostics around defining custom async method builders. #64314
  • NRE in `dotnet-runtime-perf` with wasm+AOT #64312

Closed

  • Missing closing parenthesis on auto-completion #64328
    Backlog
  • [Automated] PRs inserted in VS build main-32927.219 #64327
  • Inheritance Margin throws `StreamJsonRpc.RemoteInvocationException`, saying the source files are not included in the solution if they are generated by source generators #63232
    17.4
  • arglist is not considered for method argument mixing #64308
    C# 12.0
  • Unable to cast object of type 'System.Double' to type 'System.Nullable`1[System.Decimal]' #64315

PullRequests

Created

  • Avoid writing `CDATA` to generated targets file #64334
    Area-Compilers
  • Checkum and enc #64333
  • Allow rename for symbols that are both defined in user code and generated #64332
    Area-IDE
  • Always bind implicit constructor initializers for explicit constructors #64331
    Area-Compilers
  • Remove portions of SolutionCrawler not used by UnitTesting team. #64330
    Area-IDE
  • Skip the stackoverflow test because it's not stable enough #64329
    Area-IDE
  • Remove LangVer check on using a native int operator #64325
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Native Int
  • Change ForAttributeWithMetadataName to use an explicit stack when recursing #64322
    Area-Compilers
  • Out as return only #64318
    Area-Compilers
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64313
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • Fix the stack overflow test #64311
    Area-IDE
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 327: Build ID 2004692 #64310
  • [LSP] Fix additional file diagnostics when in a multi-targeting project #64309
    Area-IDE, LSP
  • Avoid invoking remote EnC service for documents that do not support remote workspace #64302
    Interactive-EnC
  • Merge release/dev17.2 to release/dev17.3 #64298
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Merged

  • Introduce the new EA extensibility points for UnitTesting to actually implement/export to light up in the forked solution crawler. #64164
    Area-IDE
  • Update our test sdk version #64320
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Remove legacy 'todo list' support #64319
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Merge main to features/solutionEvents #64301
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge
  • include source-generated documents in remote inheritance-margin call #64297
    Area-IDE, Next
  • Example is not packable #64133
    Area-IDE
  • Update Roslyn version to 4.5 #64304
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64307
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Remove unused TS brace completion code #64226
    Area-IDE, Community, Next
  • Merge release/dev17.4 to main #64306
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Change the target branch #64305
    Area-Infrastructure, Next
  • Flow main-vs-deps to release/dev17.4 #64303
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merge main to main-vs-deps #64296
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge, Next
  • Merge main to features/CLaSP #64300
    Area-Infrastructure, auto-merge

Updated

  • Make remaining managed pointer type scenarios warnings #64294
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Ref Fields
  • Disallow methods with bodies in ComImport interfaces. #64257
    Area-Compilers, New Language Feature - Default Interface Impl
  • Show linked symbol in Inheritance Margin #60225
    Area-IDE
  • Allow TS to derive from the more performant internal API #64258
    Area-IDE
  • Use AdditionalFilterTexts in enum member completion #64261
    Area-IDE
  • Merge features/CLaSP into main #64282
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update ref `foreach` tests #64276
    Area-Compilers, Test
  • Inline Hints - Add narrator support to parameter hints. #64281
    Area-IDE
  • Format parameters as names in error messages #64179
    Area-Compilers
  • Fix trivia handling in 'use named arguments' refactoring #63366
    Area-IDE, Community
  • TextLoader method override detection #64192
    Area-IDE

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Backport fix for #43391 to .NET 6 #44215
  • Blazor WASM EventCallback Tuple #44214
  • ANCM (In-proc) can cause IIS worker process to become unhealthy #44211
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Reduce reliance on ApiExplorer types for `Microsoft.AspNetCore.OpenApi` consumption #44209
    .NET 8 Planning
  • BindingAddress handles bad ports poorly #44208
  • [Blazor] The `NavigationManager.GetUriWithQueryParameter()` method returns inappropriate URL when the current URL has a hash string #44204
    .NET 8 Planning
  • [SignalR] constantly reconnecting, timeout setting issue #44197

Closed

  • Kestrel not responding to HTTPS protcol with SSL #7684
    Backlog
  • Allow the encoder to split headers across frames #4722
    Backlog
  • Deployers for IIS Express and NGinx should provide default config files #5922
    Backlog
  • Consider adding tests for Microsoft.AspNetCore.Server.IntegrationTesting package #5908
    Backlog
  • Azure App Services: consider grabbing environment variable when using InsertOrAppend #4136
    Backlog
  • Add test support for 32bit IIS Express #5893
    Backlog
  • Figure out pass-through compression for nginx #5989
    Backlog
  • Analyzer: Detect using Task<T> with RequestDelegate #42523
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Endpoint object serialisation overlooks a public field #43940
  • Issue when YARP is combined into a "normal" app #44085
    7.0-rc2
  • HTTPClient does not enclose name value in quotes when using Multipart form #44200
  • Azure SignalR support for CloseOnAuthenticationExpiration #44199
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorWasmManageyouraccountTwoPersonalData_DevTools:Incorrect role type provided to the "Delete" button as link. #42362
    7.0-rc2
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_ReactRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42369
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntEmail_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Change email" button is less than 3:1. #42372
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntProfile_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Save" button is less than 3:1. #42371
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularForgotPassword_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Reset Password" button is less than 3:1. #42335
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_ReactLogin_NonTextContrast: The color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Login" button and "Remember me" checkbox is less than 3:1. #42370
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_BlazorServerManageurAccntPWD_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Update password" button is less than 3:1. #42373
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_WebAppRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Email", "Password", "Confirm password" and "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42395
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_WebAppMVCRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Email", "Password", "Confirm password" and "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42397
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_AngularRegister_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Register" button is less than 3:1. #42398
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_Manageyouraccountprofile_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Save" button is less than 3:1. #42399
    7.0-rc1
  • A11y_.NET Core_ASP.NETCore_Manageyouraccounttwofactor_NonTextContrast: The Color contrast ratio of the focus indicator of the "Set up Authenticator app" and "Reset Authenticator app" button is less than 3:1. #42401
    7.0-rc1
  • [SignalR] HTTPS connection failed, and The server disconnected before the handshake could be started. #44181
  • [2.0] SignIn for cookies should honor AuthenticationProperties.RedirectUri #4667
    Backlog

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix junit output test file on timeout #44213
    area-signalr
  • [7.0] Fix ANCM hosting bundle conditions for older OS #44207
    area-infrastructure

Merged

  • Update docs to clarify feedback from #37240 #44212
    8.0-preview1
  • Add RequestDelegate analyzer #44048
    area-infrastructure, area-runtime, 8.0-preview1
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'main' #44198

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • SearchBox Background #10357
  • [iOS] TabBar Icons not showing when using FontIconSource for Tab.Icon #10350
  • [iOS] Status Bar Background rectangle visible in Landscape mode #10349
  • NullReferenceException from Shell GetBackButtonBehavior #10348
  • Look at making accessibility properties a NOOP for some invalid cases on iOS #10347
    .NET 7 + Servicing
  • iOS Simulators list not populated #10346
  • Global MAUI Reference #10345
  • Maui failed to reference ios binding library #10344
  • AL1012: 'arm64' is not a valid setting for option 'platform' thrown when localized resources are available and debugging on remote iOS device #10342
  • Page.Unloaded does not fire when app is closed #10341
    Backlog
  • [Bug] "Live Visual Tree" doesn't work for a MAUI app on Windows, but works for a WinUI3 app #10339
  • MSBuild says Android API 31 missing when trying to build MAUI app, but it isn't missing. #10337

Closed

  • VoiceOver doesn't navigate to items contained in a CollectionView which has a SemanticProperties.Description set #7114
    .NET 8 Planning
  • Change the control type announced by the VoiceOver screen reader when it encounters a Maui Picker control #7001
    7.0
  • MauiApp is a Poor Name for a Class - Should be Renamed #10343
  • Black screen on iOS #10314
  • Picker ‘SelectedIndex’ is not effective #10305
  • iOS and Android in releasemode does not change background color on button when changing states. #10335
  • Issue Building the simplest of Repos #10340
  • There is no link for mac installations #10179
  • Grid no longer adds implicit rows/columns #10338
  • DeviceDisplay.MainDisplayInfoChanged The active Window can not be detected. Ensure that you have called Init in your Application class. #7809
    Backlog
  • Windows Capabilities in appxmanifest not properly used by building .msix #10287
  • Unable to build a project with net7 RC 1 #10234
    .NET 7 Planning
  • [Enhancement] Introduce a new FlyoutDisplayOptions on Shell "DisplayAsChildren" #6973

PullRequests

Created

  • Fix FilePicker on Windows Unpackaged #10356
    7.0-rc2
  • Use a better fix for the ios16 things #10355
  • Disconnect lifecycle callback when nav removed #10353
    area/lifecycle 🔁
  • [Android] Implement PointerGestureRecognizer for Android #10352

Merged

  • Bring upstream version changes to `release/6.0.5xx-sr6` branch #10354
  • Standardize all the ctors for the core handlers #10332
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #10336
    t/housekeeping ♻︎

Updated

  • Bumps for 7.0.0-rc2 #10290
    area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix Essentials Email #10063
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/essentials 🍞, 7.0-rc2
  • Fix Semantic Property Propagation and CV TabStop #10156
    area/a11y, 7.0
  • Sizing and inset math corrections for Button contentlayout #10309
    area/controls 🎮
  • Preserve the correct binding context for menu items #7358
    area/desktop 🖥️, 7.0
  • Implement Entry IsSpellCheckEnabled property #7442
    area/controls 🎮, control-entry, .NET 7 + Servicing
  • [Windows] Pending changes to correctly updating WinUI properties via resources #8193
    platform/windows 🪟, t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [Housekeeping] Including pending fixes from Xamarin.Forms SRs #8702
    t/housekeeping ♻︎
  • [iOS] Fix wrong Slider ThumbImage size #8760
    t/bug, platform/iOS 🍎, area/controls 🎮, control-slider
  • [Windows] Fix shadows on shapes #8808
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/drawing ✏️
  • Fix AdaptiveTriggers #9984
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>, .NET 7 Planning
  • Fix remaining (API) docs warnings #10090
    area/docs 📓, t/housekeeping ♻︎, t/docs 📝
  • Allow string property binding as Color source #9814
    t/bug, area/Xaml </>
  • [Windows] Load local images without extensions on Windows #9631
    platform/windows 🪟, area/image :framed_picture:
  • [Android] Update RadioButton to get inline content view text #9633
    t/bug, platform/android 🤖, area/controls 🎮, control-radiobutton
  • Notify CheckBox Foreground update after Color changed (not before) #9678
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-checkbox
  • [Windows] Avoid crash using BoxView visibility (avoid unnecesary parent) #9840
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, high
  • Implement Keyboard on SearchBarHandler #9851
    t/bug, area/controls 🎮, control-entry
  • [Housekeeping] Complete pending TODOs in Core #10015
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️
  • [Windows] Fix crash with second window and WebView #10013
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/controls 🎮, high, control-webview
  • [Windows] Map the Window title to the automation name property #10159
    t/bug, platform/windows 🪟, area/a11y
  • Align Shapes Fill property behavior with Xamarin.Forms #10328
    t/bug, area/drawing ✏️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dbcontext scaffold introduces InvalidOperationException on Join Entity configuration for many-to-many relationships #29218
  • Json: nullable enums on entities mapped to json don't use enum-to-int converter, rather than string, like for non-nullable enums #29217
  • EF7 Json column: constructor with optional enum-parameter throws ArgumentException #29214
  • ef log some of queries in level of Information #29211

Closed

  • Add API for building raw sql queries with dynamic number of parameters #29195
  • groupby with a comparator #28138
  • Group by property that has a converted value throws exception #28300
  • Group by with projection (without aggregate) #23439

PullRequests

Created

  • [release/6.0] Query: Use type mapping from IDbFunction while translating (#27995) #29216
  • [release/6.0] Microsoft.Data.Sqlite: Avoid re-sending PRAGMA key on pooled connections #29215
    Servicing-consider, 6.0.11

Merged

  • Change Docker tags to latest schema #29213
  • Query: Final GroupBy with non-nullable column #29209
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0
  • Query: Generate condition for table splitting when no required properties #29207
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0

Updated

  • SQLite: Use infix GLOB and REGEXP operators #23193
  • Query: Allow final GroupBy entity type #29205
  • Generate condition for required property in optional dependents #29206
    Servicing-consider, 7.0.0
  • Add support for Global Query Filters on derived types. #27978
    propose-close, waiting-for-response
  • [release/3.1] Move to Ubuntu 22.04 #29157
    area-infrastructure

entry.title: dotnet/installer - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-09-27
entry.content:
PullRequests

Created

  • Update the 3.1 and 6.0 implicit versions for GA #14597
  • [release/7.0.1xx] Add ARM platform support #14592

Merged

Updated

  • [release/6.0.1xx] Arm support #13378
  • [release/6.0.1xx] GetRuntimeInformation.targets: determine PortableProductMonikerRid based on OSName and Architecture. (backports #12516) #14477
    Servicing-approved
  • Remove roslyn Microsoft.CodeAnalysis.Common patch #14581
  • Adding ppc64le arch in sourcebuild props #14575
